amendment.description: To eliminate funding for the United States African Development Foundation.

action.text: Motion to table agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 42. Record Vote Number: 17.
Amendment SA 4286 proposed by Senator Lee. To eliminate funding for the United States African Development Foundation.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4286 proposed by Senator Lee.
